stories.text:
Meta submitted their yearly report to the SEC [0] which states:

> If a new transatlantic data transfer framework is not adopted and we are unable to continue to rely on SCCs or rely upon other alternative means of data transfers from Europe to the United States, we will likely be unable to offer a number of our most significant products and services, including Facebook and Instagram, in Europe, which would materially and adversely affect our business, financial condition, and results of operations.

[0] https://d18rn0p25nwr6d.cloudfront.net/CIK-0001326801/14039b47-2e2f-4054-9dc5-71bcc7cf01ce.pdf
stories.title: Meta might consider leaving Europe?
News Corp breached by suspected Chinese hackers
Ice that took roughly 2k years to form on Mt. Everest has melted in around 25

stories.text:
I created a new Instagram account for my business. Right away, it was locked and I could not log in without adding a phone number. I'm guessing it may be because I created the account from a Linux system. I added a phone number and it informed me that my account had been disabled and that I could not appeal this.

I have logged into the account 0 times and just want to create a business profile so I can connect with my users and potentially advertise in the future. Does anyone here know whom I might contact? There is no way I can find to talk with a human. There is a phone number that is entirely automated; I left a message and received no response.

Thank you.
stories.title: Ask HN: Instagram disabled my business' account before I ever logged in. Help?
Putin and Xi call for halt to NATO expansion, Kremlin says, in show of unity
Companies Could Bring Production Back West to Save Money
